description_text:
Hi, I placed an order and paid on Tuesday 2nd December for Simsonn HS Pro Shifter the H/SQ Dual-Mode Racing Simulation Shifter on pre-order, but I have not since had a confirmation email or text and so I am a little worried. I have tried searching the order using the confirmation number given but it cannot find it.

Can you please check that this order has gone through for me? Thank you.

Sara Mobbs

[image0.png]

conversations.body_text: Hi Sara Mobbs,  Please provide your order date, payment amount, and name so I can check your order. Shipments will begin on the 20th.

thanks for your reply,

I ordered on 2nd December 2025, the order amount was £110, £98 plus £12 postage and the name is Sara Mobbs.

Thank you

Sara Mobbs
Hi Sara Mobbs,    We apologize for the delayed response. We have located your order number and added this email address to your account. We have updated your shipping notifications.
